feed.title: Snubs
feed.subtitle: Film nerds and hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films snubbed at the Oscars. Alternating each week, one host must convince the other of their favorite films' deserved nomination. They discuss Oscar films and their competitive awards years, while also trying to make each other laugh.

author.name: High Tops Media & Caroline Young, Chris Masciarelli

entry.title: The Founder - Season 2 Episode 8
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss John Lee Hancock’s The Founder, and the 2017 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wants the Coen Brothers to give this one a go and Chris says “late stage capitalism” a lot.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: American Psycho - Season 2 Episode 7
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Mary Harron’s American Psycho, and the 2001 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wants to bring back problematic faves and Chris wants everyone to know that Caroline chose this movie.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Midsommar - Season 2 Episode 6
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Ari Aster’s Midsommar, and the 2019 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is out on Dickens and Chris still sucks at recasting.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: The Last Duel - Season 2 Episode 5
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Ridley Scott’s The Last Duel and the 2021 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline loves Adam Driver and Chris can speak Japanese but not French. Oh and Ben Affleck has medieval bleach blonde hair.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Burn After Reading - Season 2 Episode 4
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss The Coen Brothers’ Burn After Reading and the 2009 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline thinks Ron Howard is overrated and Chris wants Queen Consort Camilla on the $2 bill.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Groundhog Day - Season 2 Episode 3
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Harold Ramis’ Groundhog Day and the 1994 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline loves Glee, Chris loves Stephen Tobolowsky, and they get into a nearly friendship ending argument.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Oscars 2023 Recap - Season 2 Episode 2
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss the 2023 Oscars. Chris was right about Jamie Lee Curtis and Caroline was wrong about Steven Spielberg.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.summary: On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss the 2023 Oscars. Chris was right about Jamie Lee Curtis and Caroline was wrong about Steven Spielberg.

entry.title: Dazed and Confused + 2023 Oscar Nominees Chat - Season 2 Episode 1

link.title: Dazed and Confused + 2023 Oscar Nominees Chat - Season 2 Episode 1

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Richard Linklater’s Dazed and Confused and the 1994 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. But first, they will be discussing the 2023 Oscar nominations and some of the snubs and surprises that came with the list. It’s a great year in movies and there’s much to talk about after their brief hiatus. Caroline is Team Fabelmans and Team Colin Farrell all the way, and Chris has an unexpected favorite Linklater film.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Frances Ha - Season 1 Episode 43
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Noah Baumbach’s Frances Ha, and the 2013 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is gonna be so poor and Chris thinks Caroline and Greta Gerwig would be friends.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Enough Said - Season 1 Episode 42
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Nicole Holofcener’s Enough Said, and the 2014 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. We also discuss some of the Golden Globes nominees, and what they mean for next year’s Oscars. Caroline feels like she would find herself in this situation, and Chris says “Soprano’s” in the most Jersey way possible.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
